page.title: 05TRANSPORT-EPPING GREEN
page.content: THE BLOCK IS NOT SERVED BY A RAILWAY LINE.THE NEAREST MAINLINE STATION IS AT HARLOW,AND THERE IS AN UNDERGROUND CONNECTION AT EPPING.EACH OF THE VILLAGES,EPPING GREEN NAZEING AND BUMBLES GREEN IS SERVED BY A BUS ROUTE,BUT MANY OF THE PEOPLE INTERVIEWED WERE DISSATISFIED WITH THE FREQUENCY AND PUNCTUALITY OF THIS SERVICE.EXTREME CONCERN WAS EXPRSSED BY THOSE INTERVIEWED AT THE PROSPRCT OF THIS BEING CUT BACK EVEN FURTHER.PARTICULALY HARD HIT WOULD BE OLD AGE PENSIONERS OF THE AREA ,WHO IN MOST CASES RELY ON THE BUS FOR COLLECTING THEIR PENSION
